context.description: This wizard helps you create a new HQ plug-in project.
Select wizard to create project. To have an empty project, just don't select a wizard.
This template page asks various parameters which are used to create xml descriptor for custom inventory.
This template page asks various parameters which are used to create xml descriptor for basic inventory.
This template page asks config option name used for PTQL query.
This template page asks config option name used for PTQL query.
This template page ask if during xml descriptor creation filter tags are used.
This page asks names of detector and collector.
Specify HQ agent bundle location and name. Example location is "$HQHOME$/hyperic-hq-agent-4.0.2-EE/bundles/agent-4.0.2-EE-940"
Specify a destination directory for exported plugin. Enable checkbox if you want export to notify if file is about to overwritten.
Define locations of HQ agent bundles.
Add a new structure to model. Global denotes adding to root of the model. Others denotes possible choices under selected node.
